wiki.text:
In social psychology, the everyday concept of 'helpfulness' is really
technically defined as (1) the property of providing useful assistance, and (2)
friendliness evidenced by a kindly and helpful disposition [syn: kindliness].

For many years, social psychologists have been searching for answers to these
questions:
* Why, and when, will people help?
* Who will help?
* What can be done to lessen indifference and increase helping?
wiki.title: Helpfulness
